content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® f672 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com driftone lace beret approximate measurements after blocking 18 brim 24 circumference materials driftone 2 50g balls color 02 grey tone gauge 24 sts 32 row= 4 in st st and horseshoe lace on us size 5 3 75mm after blocking needles us size 3 3 25mm 5 3 75mm - 24 circular us size 5 3 75mm dpns 1 st marker m work either the charted or the written instructions for the horsehoe lace and horseshoe lace decrease chart if you are working the chart work all rounds from right to left horseshoe lace multiple of 10 sts round 1 *k1 yo k3 sl 1-k2tog-psso k3 yo repeat from * across round 2 k across round 3 *p1 k1 yo k2 sl 1-k2tog-psso k2 yo k1 repeat from * across round 4 *p1 k9 repeat from * across round 5 *p1 k2 yo k1 sl 1-k2tog-psso k1 yo k2 repeat from * across round 6 same as round 4 round 7 *p1 k3 yo sl 1-k2tog-psso yo k3 repeat from * across round 8 k across repeat these 8 rnds for pattern st horseshoe lace decrease chart round 1 *p1 k9 repeat from * across round 2 move m 1 st to the right *p3tog k1 yo k1 sl 1-k2tog-psso k1 yo k1 repeat from * across round 3 *p1 k7 repeat from * across round 4 move m 1 st to the right *p3tog k1 yo sl 1-k2tog-psso yo k1 repeat from * across round 5 *p1 k5 repeat from * across round 6 move m 1 st to the right *p3tog yo sl 1-k2tog-psso yo repeat from * across round 7 *p1 k3 repeat from * across begin with smaller circular co 130 sts join in the round being careful not to twists pm rib round *k1 p1 repeat from * across repeat this round for 1 ½ abbreviations beg= begin ning co= cast on cont= continue dpns=double pointed needles increase- increase k- knit kf&b= knit into the front and back of stitch k2tog= knit two sts together m1=make one m= marker mm= millimeter pm/pm= place marker p= purl p3tog= purl three sts together psso= pass slipped stitch over repeat= repeat round=round sl= slip ssk = slip 1 st as if to knit slip a second st as if to knit knit them together through the back loop sl= slip st s = stitch es st st = stockinette st decrease = together yo= yarn over p l y m o u t h y a r n® f672 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com increase round *k13 m1 repeat from * across 140 sts on needle switch to larger circular needle work horseshoe lace rnds 1-8 five times then work rnds 1-3 once more work horseshoe lace decrease rnds 1-7 moving the m over 1 st to the right on
